name: Stargazer (itch) (Norberto)
description:
Me: i have no ideas for the theme Friend 1: What if you're a ninja guy that SHOOTS NINJA STARS Friend 2: What if you're sHoOtInG aT sTaRs

Fight back an alien invasion with your ninja skills.

There are three kind of enemies: 

  • Stars just follow you
  • Sniper ships shoot laser beams
  • UFOs spawn more stars if left unchecked

Commands:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left click to throw a ninja star
  • Right click to throw many stars at once

(Sorry for the bad sounds, it's the first time that I try making them from scratch)
